DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety profile for long term treatment in children aged 5 years and <15 years on bronchial asthma in daily clinical usage/Effect on growth rate. Effect on adrenal function. Development of infection diseases by diseases type.
DOC.brief_title: Pulmicort Turbuhaler 100/200 Specific Clinical Experience Investigation
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with Pulmicort Turbuhaler for the first time due to bronchial asthma and children of >= 5 years and < 15 years old age at the start of study treatment None
DOC.keyword: bronchial asthma, Pulmicort, long term use, pediatrics
